subject: Re: [junit] Redirect requested but followRedirects is disabled
msgSnippet: ... I m shocked that you couldn t find an answer on the web. WebClient.setRedirectEnabled() is the method you want--or at least it s very close to the method
messageBody:
saldin samuel wrote:

> I am getting the following error on using HtmlUnit. I
> tried searching for a solution but I couldnt. It would
> be great if you could provide me an "how-to" to solve
> this issue.

I'm shocked that you couldn't find an answer on the web.

WebClient.setRedirectEnabled() is the method you want--or at least it's
very close to the method you want.

Good luck.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
2005 Gordon Pask Award Winner for contribution to Agile practice
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
